meaningMnemonic: Put a <radical>turkey</radical> on <radical>ice</radical> and it will only get <kanji>semi</kanji> frozen. You add more ice, and it stays the same. Only some of it will freeze. What the heck!
readingMnemonic: Finally you realize it will only <kanji>semi</kanji> freeze because it's <reading>June</reading> (じゅん)! It's too hot out for your turkey to freeze all the way. The ice keeps melting off the top and semi thawing it!
